trans-unit.source: Represents an editable content region within the design-time markup for the associated control.
Use the EditableDesignerRegion class to help manage templates at design time.

A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> will use an instance of this class with its <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetEditableDesignerRegionContent%2A> method to generate HTML markup of the region's content.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> class using the given owner and name.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner"></xref> object, or a designer that derives from <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner"></xref>.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> class using the given owner and name and the initial value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion.ServerControlsOnly*> property.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner"></xref> object, or a designer that derives from <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner"></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to have the region accept only Web server controls for content; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the HTML markup for the content of the region.
HTML markup representing the content of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> object.
Returns a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering"></xref> object containing the design-time HTML markup for the given control.
The control for which to get the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.ViewRendering"></xref> object for the current region.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the region can accept only Web server controls.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the region can contain only Web server controls; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the region can be bound to a data source.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion"></xref> content supports binding to a data source; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
